title: Brown stew chicken
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons all purpose seasoning', '4 tablespoons chicken seasoning', '4 teaspoons coarse ground black pepper', '4 chicken breast fillets, diced', '1 to 2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '1 large white onion, diced', '1 red pepper, cut into large chunks', '1 green pepper, cut into large chunks', '4 spring onions, sliced', '1 red Scotch Bonnet', '1 knob butter (optional)']
